title: [HiFi|Dgtl] Of Bitter Souls 1-6 (of 6|Speakeasy|2005-06|Empire)
description:
gesserit presents:

   A Hitlist Fills Torrent ( <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9591710" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9591710</a>  ):

      A Collection of Digital Releases:


         Of Bitter Souls 01-06 (of 06) (2005-2006) (Digital-1280) (K6DVR-Empire)


        <a href=" http://www.ign.com/articles/2005/08/16/of-bitter-souls-1-preview" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.ign.com/articles/2005/08/16/of-bitter-souls-1-preview</a>


         It took me a while to figure out what these are, exactly, but I'm pretty
         sure  now that these are it's the full original 2005 Speakeasy series
         ( http://comicbookdb.com/title.php?ID=3571 ), not the 2006 Markosia sequel
         ( http://comicbookdb.com/title.php?ID=8455 ). Appearances to the contrary
         are explained by the slightly convoluted publication history:

          - Issue #4 thru #6 were never published individually,
          - but Markosia published a complete (180 pages) collected edition in 2006,
          - which was re-published digitally in 2009.

         Finally, these single-issue versions were created in 2013 by disassembling 
         that digital trade volume. Please comment if you have reason to believe any
         of this misses the mark! :)
